alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:09PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Latah and northeastern Nez Perce Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 108 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kendrick, or 14 miles northeast of Lapwai, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Juliaetta, Kendrick and Southwick. This includes U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 22 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Idaho Palouse; Lewiston Area
